reviewerName: J. R. delong "genie in a bottle"
reviewText: my mother had searched for the solid gold cadillac for 20 plus years, I am glad to see this oft overlooked gem, to finally hit dvd at such a resonable price, The other Judy Holidat classcs onher, are just as good, highly enjoyable.
Title: Silver Screen Romances: 8 Movie Set

reviewText: These movies are fantastic to watch. I love the fact they all come in one package and the price was perfect.
Title: Silver Screen Romances: 8 Movie Set

reviewText: It is hard to judge the entire group under one heading, but on the whole they were entertaining and fun.
Title: Silver Screen Romances: 8 Movie Set

reviewText: Good movie set, the 3 Rita Hayworth and Judy Holliday movies make this set worth it's purchase price (which is very inexpensive).  Great for a long day of 'classics' which are a better mix of drama and comedy than some of their more popular counterparts.
summary: Good mix of comedy and drama in this classic set
Title: Silver Screen Romances: 8 Movie Set

reviewText: This is a great selection of Columbia films made through 1939 to 1956. All quality of the films are really good and few are just like the ones from single DVD releases. Two out of the eight are in Widescreen format. For under $10, this is a bargain for the amount and the quality of the films. The down side is that there is no subtitles, no other languages other than English and there is no special features included with this collection. There are two disks with no double sided disks, with four films on each disk.
Title: Silver Screen Romances: 8 Movie Set

reviewText: There are many nice movies that are included in this collection that I remember from years earlier and enjoyed viewing again.
Title: Silver Screen Romances: 8 Movie Set

reviewText: What a great collection! Loved all the movies. The quality was prefect, the price was prefect! If you love old movies get it!!
Title: Silver Screen Romances: 8 Movie Set
